title: Brushed Stainless Quick Scoop Red Spatula Tongs (Set of 2)
description: The QuickScoop spatula works like a combination tongs and spatula, opening and closing around food, and scooping up what you need without leaving anything behind. Made of quality brushed stainless set and safe for use in high temperatures. Brushed stainless finish.Scoops items between blades by closing tongsReleases foods by opening tongsMade with stainless steelHas adjustable locking mechanism
